data.name: The Stakeholder approach: a necessity or luxury?
data.summary: In the wake of the crisis, companies’ treatment of their customers, employees and suppliers has come under greater scrutiny than ever before. There is now growing evidence to support outperformance of companies run with stakeholders and long-term sustainability in mind. As the Chairman of the World Economic Forum said ‘Covid-19 is a litmus test for the stakeholder approach’ so please join Hannah Simons, Head of Sustainability Strategy, and Katherine Davidson, Global Sustainable Fund Manager, for a Q&A on why it is time to pay attention to this approach now and how we are driving long-term valuation creation with it.
